attributes.action: In Planning, give Neighbourhood Plans clear status during preparation stages.
attributes.additional_details:
Lack of a demonstrable 5-year housing supply or unmade Local Plans will make it harder for a Council to refuse permissions for proposals that conflict with an emerging neighbourhood plan.

http://www.fylde.gov.uk/council/planning-policy--local-plan-/neighbourhoodplanning/bryning-warton-parish-council-neighbourhood-plan/

http://www.billingshurst.gov.uk/Billingshurs-ParishCouncil/UserFiles/Files/MINUTES%20OF%20MAIN%20COUNCIL%20MEETING%2
0-%2001%20OCTOBER%202014%20DRAFT.pdf
attributes.background: Preparing a neighbourhood plan is a big investment in man hours &/or money & yet communities believe their aspirations will not be upheld by decision makers when planning applications are submitted, especially while the neighbourhood plan is being prepared or Local Plans are weak.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We've not sure what you mean by "give Neighbourhood Plans clear status during preparation stages".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
